related_configuration:
<module name="LineLength">
        <property name="fileExtensions" value="java"/>
        <property name="max" value="100"/>
        <property name="ignorePattern"
                 value='^package.*|^import.*|href\s*=\s*"[^"]*"|http://|https://|ftp://|^\s*""".*|^\s*"""\s*$'/>
    </module>
explanation: Checkstyle's LineLength check only supports line-based exclusions via regex through 'ignorePattern'. While it can exclude lines like package/import statements and URLs, it cannot conditionally ignore long lines based on content type such as IDs, long text block contents, or instructions. As a result, line length enforcement is only partially supported.
